message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $100, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and my previous offer of $110. How about $105?
I'm still trying to save some money, so I'll go back to $102. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not getting any younger, and I'd rather not go back and forth forever. I'll meet you at $108, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to buying from John, but I still want to see if we can come to an agreement. I'll go back to $104. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not getting any closer to $120, and I think we're getting to the point where it's not worth my while to continue negotiating. I'll meet you at $110, but that's my final offer.
I understand that you're not willing to budge further, but I'm still trying to save some money. I'll go back to $105. Can you reconsider?
